core

Class BaseImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.BaseImage
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Image

    public class BaseImage
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic image editing tool.
    Author:
    cy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BaseImage(int width, int height)
      creates a black image with width and height.
      BaseImage(java.lang.String source)
      Opens an image from a file source.

      Set a specific section to an Image.

      • subSection

        public BaseImage subSection(int x,
                            int y,
                            int width,
                            int height)
        Returns a subsection of the image. May throw an out of bounds exception if the section is not within the image.
        Parameters:
        x - - Starting x position of the sub-image.
        y - - Starting y position of the sub-image.
        width - - Width of the sub-image.
        height - - Height of the sub-image.
        Returns:
        Image which is a smaller part of the original.

      • setSection

        public void setSection(int x,
                       int y,
                       BaseImage image)
        Set a specific section to an Image. May throw an out of bounds exception if the section is not within the image.
        Parameters:
        x - - Left-most x coordinate for the sub-image.
        y - - Upper y coordinate for the sub-image.
        image - - Image to be set.
